name: socks
description: These are socks. Put 'em on your feet.

name: wool socks
description: These are warm socks made of wool.

name: sneakers
description: These are athletic sneakers. Guaranteed to make you run faster and jump higher!

name: cleats
description: These are sport shoes with hard undersides, and studs on the bottom designed to dig into the grass.

name: football armor
description: This is heavy plastic armor worn on your upper torso. It's normally worn by football players.

name: football helmet
description: This is a heavy plastic helmet normally worn by football players.

name: boots
description: These are tough leather boots. They are designed to be very durable.

name: fur boots
description: This are boots lined internally with fur for warmth.

name: steeltoed boots
description: These are leather boots with a steel toe. They are extremely durable.

name: combat boots
description: These are modern, reinforced tactical combat boots. They are very durable, and designed to protect your feet without inhibiting mobility.

name: hiking boots
description: These are tough, yet light leather boots. They are very durable and comfortable.

name: winter boots
description: These are cumbersome boots designed for warmth in cold conditions.

name: mocassins
description: These are simple shoes made from animal pelts.

name: flip-flops
description: These are simple sandals. They are very difficult to run in, but would be good to wear at the beach.

name: dress shoes
description: These are fancy patent leather shoes. They are not designed for running in.

name: heels
description: These are pair of high heels. They are difficult to even walk in.

name: chitinous boots
description: These are boots made from the exoskeletons of insects. They are light and durable.

name: bone armor boots
description: These are leather boots, armored with reinforcements made from bone. They are light and strong.

name: leather armor boots
description: These are thick leather boots made specifically to protect the feet. They are light and tough.

name: swimming trunks
description: This is a pair of swimming trunks, with netting.

name: shorts
description: These are a pair of khaki shorts.

name: cargo shorts
description: These are a pair of shorts lined with pockets, offering decent storage.

name: jeans
description: These are a pair of blue jeans with two deep pockets.

name: pants
description: These are a pair of khaki pants. They are slightly warmer than jeans.

name: leather pants
description: These are a pair of black leather pants. They are very tough, but cumbersome and provides little storage.

name: leather chaps
description: These are a pair of black leather chaps. Very tough, and light, but they don't offer any storage.

name: cargo pants
description: These are a pair of pants lined with many pockets, offering lots of storage.

name: army pants
description: These are a tough pair of pants lined with pockets. The strength, light material, and design indicate it's favored by the military.

name: ski pants
description: These are a pair of pants meant for alpine skiing.

name: fur pants
description: This is a hefty pair of fur-lined pants.

name: long underwear top
description: This is a long underwear top that helps to maintain body temperature.

name: long underwear bottom
description: These are a pair of long underwear that help to maintain body temperature.

name: union suit
description: This is a one-piece suit of full-body long underwear that helps to maintain body temperature.

name: arm warmers
description: These are snug, soft cloth sleeves to keep your arms warm.

name: leg warmers
description: These are snug, soft cloth sleeves to keep your legs warm.

name: skirt
description: This is a short, breezy cotton skirt. It's easy to move in, but only has a single small pocket.

name: jumpsuit
description: This is a thin, short-sleeved jumpsuit; similar to those worn by prisoners. It provides decent storage and is not very encumbering.

name: wolf suit
description: This is a full body fursuit in the form of an anthropomorphic wolf. It is quite encumbering and has little storage but is very warm.

name: clown suit
description: This is a colorful and ridiculous costume fit for a clown. It provides decent storage.

name: clown shoes
description: These are gigantic shoes fit for a clown. They are incredibly difficult to walk in.

name: bondage suit
description: This is a suit of snug, black leather. It has no pockets, but does feature an abundance of unusually located zippers.

name: bondage mask
description: This is a tight fitting mask made of black leather. The eyes and mouth can be closed using zippers.

name: leather corset
description: This is a snug, black leather corset. It has no pockets, but its thick material provides good protection from harm.

name: wetsuit
description: This is a full-body neoprene wetsuit, designed for diving and other aquatic activities.

name: swimming booties
description: This is a pair of neoprene swimming booties, with individual toes.

name: swimming gloves
description: This is a pair of very flexible neoprene-silicon rubber gloves, suitable for underwater use.

name: spring suit
description: This is a long-sleeved spring wetsuit with pink color details and cleavage-enhancing, hip-accentuating construction. It's not as protective as a full-body suit, but less oppressive and constricting.

name: dress
description: This is a long cotton dress. Although comfortable to wear, it lacks any storage space.

name: wedding dress
description: This is a beautiful white wedding dress. What good will it be now?

name: chitinous armor
description: This is leg and body armor made from the exoskeletons of insects. It's light and durable.

name: bone body armor
description: This is body armor consisting of a leather backing suit with bone reinforcement. It's light and strong.

name: leather body armor
description: This is thick leather body armor. It's light and comfortable.

name: boiled leather armor
description: This is thick leather body armor that has been hardened via chemical treatment. It's light and strong.

name: fur body armor
description: This is thick body armor made from furs. It's warm and comfortable.

name: plated leather armor
description: This is thick leather body armor that has been reinforced with strategically-placed metal plates. It's strong and comfortable.

name: leather touring suit
description: This is a thick leather body suit made for protection while riding motorcycles. It's light and very comfortable.

name: suit
description: This is a finely tailored,full-body cotton suit. It makes the apocalypse a truly gentlemanly experience.

name: tuxedo
description: This is a classy, full-body tuxedo. It makes the apocalypse feel a little more classy.

name: cleansuit
description: This is a simple hazardous materials handling suit. Though somewhat restrictive and fragile, wearing it will provide excellent protection against ambient radiation.

name: AEP suit
description: This is an armored environmental protection suit. It's been custom-built from a cleansuit and body armor, so it provides excellent protection against both physical harm and ambient radiation.

name: hazmat suit
description: This is an impermeable whole-body garment worn as protection against hazardous materials. Although very restrictive and fragile, wearing it will provide complete protection against ambient radiation and some other environmental hazards.

name: ANBC suit
description: This is an armored, impermeable whole-body garment worn as protection against danger of all sorts, functioning as body armor as well as protecting from nuclear, biological, and chemical hazards.

name: survivor mask
description: This is a custom-built, reinforced gas mask that covers the face and eyes. It provides excellent protection from smoke, teargas, and shrapnel.

name: survivor vest
description: This is a custom-built light vest covered with pockets and pouches. It's durable and carefully crafted to be comfortable to wear.

name: ornamental plate armor
description: This is an extremely heavy ornamental suit of armor.

name: t shirt
description: This is a short-sleeved cotton shirt.

name: long-sleeved shirt
description: This is a long-sleeved cotton shirt.

name: flag shirt
description: This is a t-shirt embroidered with the pattern of an American flag.

name: polo shirt
description: This is a short-sleeved cotton shirt, slightly thicker than a t-shirt.

name: dress shirt
description: This is a white button-down shirt with long sleeves. It looks professional!

name: sheriff's shirt
description: This is a tan button-down shirt with long sleeves.

name: camo tank top
description: This is a sleeveless cotton shirt with camouflage dye. It's very easy to move in.

name: tank top
description: This is a sleeveless cotton shirt. It's very easy to move in.

name: bikini top
description: This is a simple bikini top.

name: leather bikini top
description: This is a simple leather bikini top.

name: fur bikini top
description: This is a simple fur bikini top.

name: hot pants
description: This is a simple pair of short shorts.

name: leather hot pants
description: This is a simple pair of leather short shorts.

name: fur hot pants
description: This is a simple pair of fur short shorts.

name: sweatshirt
description: This is a thick cotton shirt. It provides warmth and a bit of padding.

name: sweater
description: This is a wool shirt. It provides some warmth.

name: hoodie
description: This is a sweatshirt with a hood and a "kangaroo pocket" in front for storage.

name: sports jersey
description: This is a shirt made of thick material imprinted with the name and logo of a sports team.

name: under armor
description: This is an athletic under-shirt that clings to your chest to maintain body temperature.

name: tights
description: This is a snug cloth garment which clings tightly to the legs and can help maintain body temperature.

name: light jacket
description: This is a thin cotton jacket with a hood. It's good for brisk weather.

name: jean jacket
description: This is a jacket made from denim. It provides decent protection from cuts.

name: flannel jacket
description: This is a jacket made from flannel style denim, popular with forestry and grunge types. It provides decent protection from cuts.

name: blazer
description: This is a professional-looking wool blazer. It's quite cumbersome.

name: leather jacket
description: This is a jacket made from thick leather. It's cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts.

name: kevlar vest
description: This is a heavy bulletproof vest. It provides excellent protection from cuts and bullets.

name: rain coat
description: This is a plastic coat with two very large pockets. It provides protection from rain and some protection from acid rain.

name: rain hood
description: This is a waterproof hood made to be worn in bad weather. It provides extra protection from rain.

name: fishing waders
description: These are waterproof plastic fishing waders with a single large front pocket.

name: wool poncho
description: This is a simple wool garment worn over the torso. It provides a bit of protection.

name: trenchcoat
description: This is a thin cotton trenchcoat, lined with pockets. It's great for storage.

name: flotation vest
description: This is a brightly-colored vest designed to keep you upright and floating in water.

name: leather trenchcoat
description: This is a thick leather trenchcoat, lined with pockets. It's great for storage.

name: fur trenchcoat
description: This is a thick fur trenchcoat, lined with pockets. It's great for storage.

name: winter coat
description: This is a padded coat with deep pockets and a hood. It's very warm.

name: fur coat
description: This is a fur coat with a couple small pockets. It's extremely warm.

name: peacoat
description: This is a heavy wool coat. It's cumbersome, but warm and with deep pockets.

name: utility vest
description: This is a light vest covered in pockets and straps for storage.

name: leather vest
description: This is a vest made from thick leather. It offers excellent protection from cuts.

name: tool belt
description: This is a common belt with pockets widely used by handymen, and electricians.

name: chest rig
description: This is a light vest covered in webbing, pockets and straps. The strength, light material, and design indicate it's favored by the military.

name: lab coat
description: This is a long white coat with several large pockets.

name: soft arm sleeves
description: This is a pair of soft neoprene arm sleeves, often used in contact sports.

name: hard arm guards
description: This is a pair of neoprene arm sleeves covered with molded plastic sheaths.

name: elbow pads
description: This is a pair of elbow pads made of stout plastic and cloth.

name: chitin arm guards
description: This is a pair of arm guards made from the exoskeletons of insects. It's light and durable.

name: metal arm guards
description: This is a pair of arm guards hammered out from metal. It's a very stylish example of post-apocalypse armor.

name: glove liners
description: This is a pair of thin cotton gloves. It's often used as a liner beneath other gloves.

name: light gloves
description: This is a pair of cotton gloves.

name: mittens
description: This is a pair of warm mittens. They are extremely cumbersome.

name: fur gloves
description: This is a pair of warm fur gloves. They are somewhat cumbersome.

name: wool gloves
description: This is a thick pair of wool gloves. It's cumbersome but warm.

name: winter gloves
description: This is a pair of padded gloves. It's cumbersome but warm.

name: leather gloves
description: This is a thin pair of black leather gloves.

name: tactical gloves
description: This is a pair of reinforced kevlar tactical gloves. This type of glove are commonly used by police and military units.

name: fingerless gloves
description: This is a pair of leather gloves with no fingers, allowing greater manual dexterity.

name: armored fingerless gloves
description: This is a pair of leather gloves with no fingers, allowing greater manual dexterity. These have been crudely reinforced with steel guards across the back.

name: rubber gloves
description: This is a pair of rubber gloves, often used while cleaning with caustic materials.

name: rubber boots
description: This is a pair of rubber boots, often used while cleaning with caustic materials.

name: medical gloves
description: This is a pair of thin latex gloves, designed to limit the spread of disease.

name: fire gauntlets
description: This is a heavy pair of leather gloves, used by firefighters and metalworkers for heat protection.

name: chitinous gauntlets
description: These are gauntlets made from the exoskeletons of insects. These are very light and durable.

name: bone armor gauntlets
description: These are leather gauntlets with reinforcement incorporating bone. They are very light and strong.

name: leather armor gauntlets
description: These are heavily padded fingerless leather gloves. Very flexible and comfortable.

name: dust mask
description: This is a simple piece of cotton that straps over the mouth. It provides a small amount of protection from air-borne illness and dust.

name: bandana
description: This is a cotton bandana, folded and tied to be worn over the mouth for warmth and minor protection from dust and other contaminants.

name: scarf
description: This is a long wool scarf, to be worn over the mouth for warmth.

name: scarf
description: This is a long fur scarf, to be worn over the mouth for warmth.

name: filter mask
description: This is a mask that straps over your mouth and nose and filters the surrounding air. It protects from smoke, dust, and other contaminants quite well.

name: gas mask
description: This is a full gas mask that covers the face and eyes. It provides excellent protection from smoke, teargas, and other contaminants.

name: eyeglasses
description: This is a pair of glasses for the near-sighted. They would be useless for anyone else.

name: reading glasses
description: This is a pair of glasses for the far-sighted. They would be useless for anyone else.

name: bifocal glasses
description: This is a pair of bifocal glasses for those who are both near-sighted and far-sighted.

name: safety glasses
description: This is a pair of plastic glasses, used in workshops, sports, chemistry labs, and many other places. Provides great protection from damage.

name: swim goggles
description: This is a small pair of goggles. Distorts vision above water, but allows you to see much further under water.

name: ski goggles
description: This is a large pair of goggles that completely seal off your eyes. They  provide excellent protection from environmental dangers.

name: welding goggles
description: This is a dark pair of goggles. They make seeing very difficult, but protect you from bright flashes.

name: light amp goggles
description: This is a pair of goggles that amplify ambient light, allowing you to see in the dark.  You must be carrying a powered-on unified power supply, or UPS, to use them.

name: ballistic glasses
description: This is modern tactical eyewear that protects from small projectiles and fragments. It provides excellent protection from environmental dangers.

name: monocle
description: This is an essential article of the gentleman's apparel. It also negates near-sightedness.

name: sunglasses
description: This is a pair of sunglasses, good for keeping the glare out of your eyes.

name: baseball cap
description: This is a Red Sox baseball cap. It provides a little bit of warmth.

name: boonie hat
description: This hat is also called a "bucket hat." It's often used in the military.

name: cotton hat
description: This is a snug-fitting cotton hat. It's quite warm.

name: knit hat
description: This is a snug-fitting wool hat. It's very warm.

name: hunting cap
description: This is a red plaid hunting cap with ear flaps. It's notably warm.

name: fur hat
description: This is a hat made from the pelts of animals. It's extremely warm.

name: balaclava
description: This is a warm covering that protects the head and face from cold.

name: hard hat
description: This is a hard plastic hat worn in constructions sites. It provides excellent protection from cuts and percussion.

name: pickelhaube
description: This is a spiked helmet once worn by German military officers. The spike is very sharp.

name: beret
description: This is a soft cotton hat commonly worn by armed forces and existentialists.

name: wool beret
description: This is a soft wool hat commonly worn by armed forces and existentialists.

name: bike helmet
description: This is a thick foam helmet. It's designed to protect against concussion.

name: skid lid
description: This is a small metal helmet that covers the head and protects against cuts and percussion.

name: baseball helmet
description: This is a hard plastic helmet that covers the head and ears. It's designed to protect against a baseball to the head.

name: army helmet
description: This is a heavy helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage. The strength, light material, and design indicate it's favored by the military.

name: helmet liner
description: This is a helmet liner that goes inside a helmet to make it warmer.

name: riot helmet
description: This is a helmet with a plastic shield that covers your entire face. The strength, light material, and design indicate it's favored by police forces.

name: motorcycle helmet
description: This is a helmet with covers for your head and chin, leaving space in-between for you to wear goggles.

name: chitinous helmet
description: This is a helmet made from the exoskeletons of insects. It covers the entire head; it's very light and durable.

name: bone armor helmet
description: This is a grotesque, horned helmet carved from bone. It covers the entire head; it's very light and strong.

name: great helm
description: This is a medieval helmet that provides excellent protection to the entire head, at the cost of great encumbrance.

name: top hat
description: The only hat for a gentleman. Wear it to look exquisite while laughing in the face of danger!

name: bowler hat
description: The only hat for a made man. Wear it to look like a real good fella while laughing in the face of your foes!

name: backpack
description: This is a small backpack, providing good storage for a little encumbrance.

name: leather backpack
description: This is a small leather backpack, providing good storage for a little encumbrance.

name: military rucksack
description: This is a huge military style rucksack with many pockets and pouches. It provides a lot of storage.

name: duffel bag
description: This is a huge duffel bag. It provides plenty of storage but it's hard to wear and severely encumbering.

name: purse
description: This is large purse, the type you wear over your shoulder. It's a bit cumbersome to wear, but provides some storage.

name: messenger bag
description: This is bag worn over the chest and shoulder, commonly used by bicycle couriers. It's light and easy to wear, but doesn't offer much storage.

name: fanny pack
description: This a pouch affixed to a belt that fits easily over your clothing. It provides a bit of extra storage without encumbering you at all.

name: tactical dump pouch
description: This is an expandable pouch secured with straps, worn on the belt. It provides a bit of extra storage without encumbering you at all.

name: holster
description: This is a holster, worn either on the upper leg or belt, usually meant for holding a pistol. It provides a bit of extra storage without encumbering you at all.

name: bootstrap
description: This is a small holster worn on the ankle.

name: quiver
description: This is a leather quiver worn on the back or at the hip that can hold 20 arrows. Its small size won't encumber you, and you could hold other small items with it in a pinch.

name: large quiver
description: This is a large leather quiver trimmed with metal, worn on the back, that can hold 80 arrows. You could hold other small items with it in a pinch. Historically it has used by horse archers, rather than foot archers, but neither of THEM had to fight zombies.

name: pouch
description: This is a makeshift bag, cobbled together from rags and string. It really gets in the way, but at least it provides a decent amount of storage.

name: leather pouch
description: This is a bag stitched together from leather scraps. It doesn't hold an awful lot, but it is easy to wear.

name: gold ring
description: This is a flashy gold ring. You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.

name: silver necklace
description: This is a nice silver necklace. You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.

name: small relic
description: This is a small relic from a forgotten saint.  As extraordinary as the world has become, this reliquary may have some power yet.

name: radiation badge
description: This is a plastic badge with an embedded film strip. The film strip changes color as it is exposed to radiation. Wear on your lapel so you can notice if it changes.

name: deputy badge
description: This is a tarnished gold star that gives an air of authority to the wearer.

name: american flag
description: This is a large American flag, made to fly in even the worst conditions.

name: blanket
description: This is a warm and comfy blanket. But, hiding under here will not protect you from the monsters.

name: fur blanket
description: This is a heavy fur blanket that covers most of your body.

name: emergency blanket
description: This is a compact wool blanket that covers your most important body parts, meant to keep you warm in emergency situations.

name: sleeping bag
description: This is a large sleeping bag that covers you head to toe.

name: fur sleeping bag
description: This is a large sleeping bag lined with fur. Who needs a tent?

name: housecoat
description: This is a soft bathrobe. It makes you wish you had running water to take a shower.

name: snuggie
description: A bathrobe with longer sleeves and thicker material to stay nice and toasty. It's perfect to relax in and read all those books you stole.

name: cloak
description: This is a heavy cloak that is thrown over your body.

name: fur cloak
description: This is a heavy fur cloak that is thrown over your body.

name: leather cloak
description: This is a heavy leather cloak that is thrown over your body. It provides decent protection.

name: jedi cloak
description: This stylish cloak is perfect for master and padawan alike.

name: basic power armor
description: This is DoubleTech Power Armor, Mk. I. This is a heavy suit of basic power armor, offering very good protection against attacks, but hard to move in.

name: basic power armor helmet
description: This is a basic helmet, designed for use with the DoubleTech Power Armor, Mk. I. Offers excellent protection from both attacks and environmental hazards.

name: light power armor
description: This is a suit of DoubleTech Power Armor, Mk. II-L. This model offers several improvements over the Mk. I, most notably a lighter weight.

name: light power armor helmet
description: This is a power armor helmet designed for use with the DoubleTech Power Armor, Mk. II-L. This improved design is lighter and cooler than the Mk. I helmet.

name: heavy power armor
description: This is a suit of DoubleTech Power Armor, Mk. II-H. This model offers several improvements over the Mk. I, most notably providing additional protection in hazardous environments.

name: heavy power armor helmet
description: This is a power armor helmet designed for use with the DoubleTech Power Armor, Mk. II-H. This improved design is heavier than the Mk. I helmet, but cooler, and offers better environmental protection.

name: power armor hauling frame
description: This is a heavy duty hauling frame designed to interface with power armor.

name: salvaged power armor
description: This is DoubleTech Power Armor, Mk. I. This is a heavy suit of basic power armor, offering very good protection against attacks, but hard to move in. This suit has had its servos and cooling system stripped out, meaning it no longer requires power, but also encumbers you greatly and doesn't provide internal thermal regulation.

name: salvaged power armor helmet
description: This is a basic helmet, designed for use with the DoubleTech Power Armor, Mk. I. It offers excellent protection from both attacks and environmental hazards. This suit has had its internal computer and cooling system stripped out, meaning it no longer requires power, but it has no internal chronometer and doesn't provide internal thermal regulation.

name: arm splint
description: This is a tool to help set bones and hold them in place. This splint has a brace and sling sized for an arm.

name: leg splint
description: This is a tool to help set bones and hold them in place. This splint has a brace and sling sized for an leg.

name: hard leg guards
description: This is a pair of polyurethane leg guards with neoprene backing.

name: knee pads
description: This is a pair of knee pads made of stout plastic and cloth.

name: metal leg guards
description: This is a pair of leg guards hammered out from metal. It's a very stylish example of post-apocalypse armor.

name: wrist watch
description: This is a simple wristwatch. It tells the time and has an alarm clock feature.

name: toque
description: This is a traditional chefs hat, standing tall and proud against the vulgarities of the world.

name: chefs jacket
description: This double-breasted uniform is unusually thick to protect against the heat of the kitchen.

name: checkered pants
description: This is a pair of checkered pants. In a pinch, these pants can be used for an impromptu game of checkers.

name: scrap suit
description: This is a suit of armor forged from scraps of metal; it provides decent protection, but the loose collection of plates jangles and clangs as you walk, attracting the attention of all nearby.

name: bookplate
description: This is a crude form of armor made from stacked paper and rolls of duct tape. This breastplate offers a surprising amount of protection.

name: light survivor suit
description: This is a lightweight home built combination armor made from a cut down bulletproof vest and a reinforced jumpsuit made out of fabric. It protects from the elements as well as from harm.

name: survivor suit
description: This is a home built combination armor made from a bulletproof vest and a reinforced jumpsuit made out of leather. It protects from the elements as well as from harm.

name: armored boots
description: This is an extremely heavy set of armor plated boots.

name: armored gauntlets
description: This is an extremely heavy set of armor plated gloves.

name: heavy survivor suit
description: This is a heavy home built combination armor made from a reinforced bulletproof vest and a metal armor plated jumpsuit made out of leather. It protects from the elements as well as from harm.

name: winter survivor suit
description: This is a warm and heavy, home built combination armor made from a reinforced bulletproof vest and an insulated jumpsuit made out of leather. It protects from the elements as well as from harm.

name: survivor boots
description: This is a pair of customized, heavily armored boots, modified to provide maximum protection from harm and the elements, even when knee-deep in the dead.

name: survivor gloves
description: This is a pair of heavily customized, armored gloves, modified to be easy of wear while providing maximum protection under extreme conditions.

name: survivor helmet
description: This is a customized, heavily armored helmet, modified to provide maximum comfort and protection from harm.

name: SWAT armor
description: This is a police suit of black bulletproof armor with lots of pockets. The word SWAT is emblazoned across the back.

name: tactical helmet
description: This is a black helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage. The strength, light material, and design indicate it's favored by police forces.

name: plate armor
description: This is a suit of gothic plate armor.

name: barbute helm
description: This is a medieval helmet that provides excellent protection for the head, with a Y shaped opening for the face.

name: leather armor helmet
description: This is a thick leather helmet that provides excellent protection for the head.

name: Ō-yoroi
description: This is an ornamental suit of Japanese samurai armor.

name: kabuto
description: This is a medieval Japanese helmet with a scowling facemask that provides excellent protection to the entire head and face.

name: leather apron
description: This is an apron made of thick leather. It's cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts.

name: ballistic mask
description: This is a protective reinforced kevlar mask that covers the face. It provides excellent protection from ballistic threats.

name: hockey mask
description: This is a protective face mask made of thick plastic. It's commonly worn by hockey goalies and unstoppable serial killers.

name: drop leg pouches
description: This is a set of pouches that can be worn on the thighs using buckled straps. The strength, light material, and design indicate it's favored by the military.

name: leather cat ears
description: This is a shiny pair of black cat ears on a headband. It does nothing, but there's no reason not to look good even if no one's looking.

name: fuzzy cat ears
description: This is a fuzzy pair of brownish cat ears on a headband. It does nothing, but there's no reason not to look good even if no one's looking.

name: leather cat tail
description: This is a glossy black leather tail weighted down with tiny beads of plastic. It sways behind you when you walk.

name: fuzzy cat tail
description: This is a fuzzy tawny tail weighted down with tiny beads of plastic. It sways behind you when you walk.

name: fur kitty collar
description: This is a decorative 'collar' made out of fur. Complete with a little bell hanging from the front.  Don't worry, it's silent.

name: pot helmet
description: This is a helmet made from a soup pot. It's not very good protection, but it's better than nothing.

name: leather collar
description: This is a black leather 'collar' with a bell dangling from the front. Don't worry, the bell is silent.
